name: Nanometallurgy
tag: Manipulate metals at the molecular level

quote.text: Our scientists now use fractal theory to "teach" the molecules to assume, or resume, a particular form. Substances of amazing strength become simple once the formulae are properly computed.

description: Driven by the requirements of Doctrine: Initiative (E5) and the mathematical models behind Probability Mechanics (B7), Nanometallurgy techniques allow engineers to manipulate metals at the molecular level.
